__e: Either way they do not need these anymore.
Without them, he has neither the means to practise his trade nor support his family.
Without them, I don't think I would be the woman that I am today.
They're the future, we're the past...
And in reality they are, in practice, beyond the law.
The moment a man lays with a woman, they are married in the eyes of the Lord.
And all your mates behind there, whoever the hell they are.
You should be out there right now, trying to find the people, whoever they are!
We don't know, but... wherever they are, I'm sure they love you very much.
In practice, they don't know each other, either.
I don't know, but there are only four salt depots on the island, and one of 'em happens to be within three blocks of our crime scene.
Blood, muscle, and bone... When those are lost, humans face death...
The monsters I created,the people they killed.
They still have something else to say...
Just like I know when affairs end badly, like yours most certainly did, they have a way of staying under the skin whether you want them to or not.
That's right, yeah, and one of them was murdered.
He's one of "they. " He's one of them.
And I look into them now... and I need to know... was this a miracle?
